Cláudio Ramos elogia visual de Ronaldo e tece críticas a Georgina Rodríguez
05 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Duarte Costa

O casal marcou presença nos MTV European Music Awards, este domingo, e face ao mediatismo de ambos era já expectável que fossem alvo de avaliação por parte de críticos da moda. Cláudio Ramos foi um dos que comentou o visual de Georgina Rodríguez e de Cristiano Ronaldo.

À conversa com Cristina Ferreira, no ‘Programa’ desta terça-feira, o ‘vizinho do lado’ disse que numa fase inicial até achou que a modelo estava bonita, mas através de um olhar mais atento a opinião mudou. “O vestido era muito feio”, atirou. “Nunca uses aquilo”.
Já sobre o português, Cláudio Ramos reservou-lhe um elogio. “O Cristiano Ronaldo ia muito bonito”, considerou.

text:
Cláudio Ramos praises Ronaldo's look and criticizes Georgina Rodríguez
05 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Duarte Costa

The couple were present at the MTV European Music Awards this Sunday, and in view of their mediatism it was already expected that they would be the target of criticism by fashion critics. Claudio Ramos was one of those who commented on the look of Georgina Rodríguez and Cristiano Ronaldo.

Speaking to Cristina Ferreira on Tuesday's "Program", the "neighbor next door" said that at an early stage he even thought the model was beautiful, but through a closer look the opinion changed. "The dress was very ugly," he shot. "Never wear that."
Regarding Portuguese, Claudio Ramos reserved a compliment. “Cristiano Ronaldo was very handsome,” he considered.
